name: TD_sync_physical_devices
description: {"description": "Sync selected or all installed physical devices with topology discovery  ", "labels": []}
inputParameters: {"devices":{"value":"","description":"List of devices ex. device1,device12,device123"},"labels":{"value":"","description":"List of labels for inputted devices (work only with sync_all_installed_devices: False)"},"sync_all_installed_devices":{"value": false,"description":"Sync all devices which are installed ('devices' input will be ignored)","type":"toggle", "options": [1,0]}}
